name: NEOM Future of Living Symposium
description: A forward-thinking symposium on sustainable urbanism, AI-driven cities, and the future of human habitation.

name: Hail International Desert Sculpture Exhibition
description: Artists from around the globe create large-scale sculptures that interact with the majestic desert landscape of Hail.

name: Riyadh FinTech Forward Summit
description: The premier FinTech event in the region, focusing on blockchain, digital banking, and investment technologies.

name: Farasan Islands Freediving Championship
description: World-class freedivers compete in the pristine coral reefs of the Farasan Islands Marine Sanctuary.

name: Jeddah Smart Ports & Logistics Hackathon
description: A 48-hour intensive hackathon to develop innovative solutions for maritime logistics and port automation.

name: Asir Highlands Trail Biking Race
description: A challenging mountain biking competition across the scenic and rugged terrain of the Asir highlands.

name: Al Jouf Olive Harvest Festival
description: Celebrating the region's ancient olive traditions with olive oil tastings, pressing demonstrations, and local cuisine.

name: Dhahran Energy Tech Conference (DhaET)
description: Hosted near major industry players, this conference explores digitalization and AI in the energy sector.

name: Al-Ula Archaeological Field School
description: An immersive, hands-on workshop for students and enthusiasts to participate in a live archaeological dig.

name: Riyadh International Poetry Slam
description: A dynamic competition where poets perform their original work in a vibrant, engaging atmosphere.

name: KAUST Marine Science Open Day
description: King Abdullah University of Science and Technology opens its doors to showcase cutting-edge Red Sea research.

name: Jubail Industrial Art Festival
description: An innovative art festival where artists repurpose industrial materials into stunning public art installations.

name: Najran Petroglyph & Rock Art Tour
description: A guided expedition to the ancient rock art sites of Bir Hima, exploring thousands of years of history.

name: Al Khobar Cybersecurity Conclave
description: A critical gathering of cybersecurity experts to discuss digital defense strategies for corporate infrastructure.

name: Yanbu Waterfront Lantern Festival
description: A visually spectacular evening where thousands of floating lanterns are released over the Red Sea.

name: Riyadh Space & Astronomy Expo
description: Explore the cosmos with VR space missions, telescope viewings, and presentations from international space agencies.

name: Jeddah Indie Music Showcase
description: A festival dedicated to promoting emerging independent musicians and bands from across the Kingdom.

name: Diriyah Arabian Horse Auction
description: A prestigious auction featuring some of the finest purebred Arabian horses, held in historic Diriyah.

name: Al Ahsa Oasis Handicrafts Fair
description: A vibrant market showcasing the unique traditional crafts of the Al-Ahsa region, from pottery to weaving.

name: NEOM International Drone Racing Grand Prix
description: Top pilots navigate high-speed drones through a futuristic, neon-lit course in the heart of NEOM.

name: Dammam Petrochemical Futures Forum
description: An industry forum on innovation, sustainability, and market trends in the global petrochemical sector.

name: Taif Aromatic Plants & Perfumery Workshop
description: Learn the art of traditional perfume making and distillation using the famous roses and aromatic herbs of Taif.

name: Riyadh E-Sports Arena Inauguration
description: The grand opening of a state-of-the-art esports arena, featuring exhibition matches by world champion teams.

name: Jeddah Classic Film Retrospective
description: A festival celebrating the golden age of Arab and international cinema with restored classic film screenings.

name: Empty Quarter Endurance Rally
description: A grueling multi-day off-road race that tests the limits of drivers and vehicles in the vast Rub' al Khali desert.

name: Madinah Sacred Geometry Art Workshop
description: An artistic and spiritual workshop exploring the principles of Islamic geometric patterns in design.

name: Al Khobar Women in Leadership Summit
description: An empowering summit featuring talks and workshops from inspiring female leaders in business and technology.

name: Jeddah Waterfront Carnival
description: A family-friendly carnival along the corniche with amusement rides, street performers, and food stalls.

name: Riyadh Global Logistics & Supply Chain Expo
description: Connecting global logistics providers with businesses to explore the future of shipping, warehousing, and delivery.

name: Abha Fog Festival
description: A unique festival celebrating the cool, misty climate of Abha with cultural events and light shows in the fog.

name: Buraidah Culinary Arts Week
description: A week dedicated to the rich cuisine of the Qassim region, with a special focus on dates in savory and sweet dishes.

name: Jeddah Red Sea Tourism Investment Forum
description: A forum for investors and developers to explore opportunities in Saudi Arabia's booming Red Sea tourism sector.

name: KAUST Robotics Showcase
description: An exhibition of the latest advancements in robotics and AI from KAUST labs, including autonomous systems.

name: AlUla Ancient Kingdoms Light & Sound Show
description: A spectacular nightly show that projects the history of the Dadanite and Lihyanite kingdoms onto ancient rock faces.

name: Riyadh Calligraffiti Art Exhibition
description: A modern art show blending traditional calligraphy with contemporary graffiti and street art styles.

name: Jeddah Beach Volleyball International Open
description: Professional beach volleyball teams from around the world compete on the shores of the Red Sea.

name: Madinah Digital Islamic Library Initiative Launch
description: The official launch of a major online portal providing access to rare Islamic manuscripts and scholarly texts.

name: Tabuk Endurance Horse Race
description: A 120km endurance race for horses and riders, set against the dramatic desert landscapes of Tabuk.

name: Riyadh International Padel Championship
description: A professional padel tournament attracting top-ranked players to compete for the Riyadh Masters title.

name: Al Khobar Financial Literacy Workshop
description: A practical workshop for the public on personal finance, investing, and wealth management strategies.

name: Red Sea International Kitesurfing Open
description: A premier kitesurfing competition featuring freestyle and racing events in the perfect wind conditions of the Red Sea.

name: Dammam Maritime Museum Anniversary Gala
description: A special gala celebrating the history of seafaring in the Arabian Gulf with new exhibits and guest speakers.

name: Jeddah Corniche Skateboarding Jam
description: An open skateboarding competition and community event at the Jeddah waterfront skatepark.

name: Riyadh World of Coffee & Tea Expo
description: An international trade fair for coffee and tea enthusiasts and professionals, from bean to cup.

name: AlUla Luxury Camping & Adventure Travel Expo
description: Showcasing the latest in glamping, eco-lodges, and adventure travel experiences in spectacular settings.

name: Mecca Hajj & Umrah Services Conference
description: A conference for companies and organizations involved in providing services for Hajj and Umrah pilgrims.

name: Abha Mountain Climbing Festival
description: A festival for rock climbing enthusiasts of all levels, with guided climbs and competitions on Jabal Sawda.

name: Jeddah Seafood Gastronomy Festival
description: Top chefs create innovative dishes celebrating the diverse and fresh seafood of the Red Sea.

name: Riyadh International Animation Festival
description: A festival showcasing animated films from around the world, with workshops for aspiring animators.

name: Jizan Winter Cultural Fiesta
description: A vibrant festival celebrating the unique culture, dance, and music of the Jizan region.

name: Al-Balad Historical Reenactment Week
description: Actors and storytellers bring the ancient port of Al-Balad to life, reenacting historical events and daily life.

name: Riyadh Urban Gardening & Green Living Expo
description: An expo focused on sustainable living, with workshops on balcony gardening, composting, and vertical farming.

name: Dammam International Kite Flying Festival
description: A colorful family event on the Dammam corniche where professional kite flyers display giant, artistic kites.

name: Madinah Islamic Manuscripts Exhibition
description: A rare exhibition of beautifully preserved and illuminated Quranic manuscripts and scientific texts.

name: Al Khobar Real Estate Technology Forum
description: A forum on 'PropTech', exploring how technology is transforming real estate design, sales, and management.

name: Jeddah Red Sea Coral Reef Conservation Summit
description: A summit of marine biologists and policymakers dedicated to preserving the unique coral ecosystems of the Red Sea.

name: Riyadh Veterinary Medicine Conference
description: A professional conference for veterinarians focusing on advancements in equine medicine and falcon health.

name: Jeddah Graphic Novel & Comics Convention
description: A convention for comic book and graphic novel fans, featuring local and international artists and writers.

name: Riyadh Vintage Car Rally
description: A parade and rally of beautifully maintained classic cars driving from Riyadh's city center to historic Diriyah.

name: Taif International Honey Competition
description: Beekeepers from around the world submit their finest honey for judging at this sweet festival.

name: Al-Ula Desert Cinema Festival
description: An outdoor film festival where movies are screened under the stars against the stunning backdrop of Al-Ula's rock formations.

name: Riyadh International Book Fair for Children
description: A book fair dedicated to children's literature, with storytelling sessions, author signings, and interactive workshops.

name: Dammam Industrial Automation Expo
description: Showcasing the latest in robotics, IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things), and automation for manufacturing.

name: Jeddah International Jewelry Salon
description: An exclusive salon for high-end jewelry designers and brands to showcase their latest collections to elite clientele.

name: Al Khobar International Food Festival
description: A celebration of global cuisine with food stalls, celebrity chef demonstrations, and tasting events on the corniche.

name: Abha Traditional Archery Contest
description: A competition celebrating the heritage and skill of traditional archery, set in the green hills of Asir.

name: Riyadh AI in Education Summit
description: A summit for educators and technologists on integrating artificial intelligence into personalized learning.

name: Hail Desert Astronomy Camp
description: A weekend camping trip deep in the desert for unparalleled stargazing with expert astronomers.

name: Jeddah Fashion Incubator Showcase
description: A runway show featuring the debut collections of the next generation of talented Saudi fashion designers.

name: Al-Hasa Date Palm Festival
description: A festival celebrating the cultural significance of the date palm in the world's largest oasis.

name: Riyadh Philanthropy and Social Impact Forum
description: A forum connecting NGOs, corporations, and philanthropists to drive sustainable social change.

name: NEOM Sustainable Agriculture Conference
description: Focusing on vertical farming, desalination for agriculture, and food security technologies of the future.

name: Dammam International Boat and Marine Show
description: A premier show for marine lifestyle, featuring luxury yachts, fishing boats, and watersports equipment.

name: Jeddah International Comedy Festival
description: A week-long festival featuring stand-up performances from top international and regional comedians.

name: Riyadh Virtual Reality (VR) World Expo
description: An immersive expo where visitors can experience the latest in VR gaming, education, and simulation technology.

name: Al-Ula Traditional Weaving and Crafts Workshop
description: Learn the ancient art of Sadu weaving from local artisans in the historic old town of Al-Ula.

name: Al Khobar Contemporary Art Biennale
description: A major international exhibition of contemporary art, held every two years, focusing on emerging themes and artists.

name: Jeddah International Pet Show & Competition
description: A fun event for pet lovers, featuring agility competitions, breed showcases, and the latest in pet care products.

name: Riyadh Future of Mobility Conference
description: Exploring electric vehicles, autonomous driving, hyperloop technology, and the future of urban transport.

name: Madinah International Qirat Competition
description: A prestigious competition that brings together the world's best Quran reciters to showcase their artistry.

name: Dammam Industrial Heritage Tour
description: A guided tour exploring the history of the oil industry and the industrial development of the Eastern Province.

name: Riyadh International Gaming Festival (Gamers Con)
description: The largest gaming convention in the region, featuring esports tournaments, new game demos, and developer panels.

name: Taif Fruit Picking Festival
description: A family-friendly festival where visitors can pick their own pomegranates, figs, and grapes at local farms.

name: Jeddah International Medical Tourism Expo
description: Connecting international hospitals and wellness centers with patients seeking world-class medical treatments.

name: Al-Ula Hot Air Balloon Glow Show
description: A magical evening where tethered hot air balloons are illuminated in sync with music against the desert twilight.

name: Riyadh International Defense and Security Expo
description: A major global exhibition showcasing the latest technologies in the defense, aerospace, and security sectors.

name: Abha Paragliding Accuracy World Cup
description: An official leg of the Paragliding World Cup where pilots compete by landing on precise targets.

name: Al Khobar Startup Pitch Competition
description: Early-stage startups pitch their ideas to a panel of venture capitalists for a chance to win seed funding.

name: Jeddah International Red Sea Photo Contest
description: An awards ceremony and exhibition showcasing the best underwater and coastal photography of the Red Sea.

name: Riyadh Global AI Ethics Forum
description: A critical forum discussing the ethical implications, governance, and responsible development of artificial intelligence.

name: NEOM Marine Biology Research Symposium
description: Leading researchers present findings on the unique and resilient coral reef ecosystems of the northern Red Sea.

name: Riyadh International Franchise Expo
description: Connecting entrepreneurs with leading international brands and franchise opportunities.

name: Jeddah International Luxury Wedding Fair
description: A premier fair for wedding planning, showcasing luxury venues, designers, and services.

name: Dammam Youth Robotics Challenge
description: A competition for school and university students to design, build, and compete with their own robots.

name: AlUla International Film Music Festival
description: A festival celebrating the art of film scores, with live orchestra performances of iconic movie soundtracks in Maraya Hall.

name: Riyadh Green Building and Sustainability Expo
description: Showcasing sustainable construction materials, renewable energy solutions, and green building technologies.

name: Taif Mountain Hiking and Camping Retreat
description: A guided weekend retreat for hiking and camping enthusiasts in the beautiful Al Hada mountains.

name: Jeddah International Art Therapy Conference
description: A conference for mental health professionals on the therapeutic applications of art in clinical practice.

name: Al Khobar Design Week
description: A city-wide celebration of design, from graphic and interior to product design, with workshops and exhibitions.

name: Riyadh International Halal Food & Beverage Expo
description: A major trade show for the global Halal industry, connecting producers, distributors, and buyers.
